vps_configuration_reboot_rescue_confirma: If you confirm your request, your server will switch to rescue mode and reboot immediately. You will then receive an email containing the information you need to log in to your VPS.
vps_configuration_reboot_rescue_informat: Caution, once your VPS has rebooted in rescue mode, it will remain enabled until your VPS reboots normally again.

vps_configuration_reversedns_step1_quest: Select the IP to be configured:
vps_configuration_reversedns_step3_alert: Modifications are applied immediately, however, please bear in mind the delay required for them to fully take effect (approximately 24 hrs).
vps_configuration_reversedns_success: The reverse DNS for the {{serviceName}} VPS has been modified.
vps_configuration_reversedns_fail: An error has occurred modifying the Reverse DNS.
vps_configuration_reversedns_step1_desc1: Reverse DNS is the opposite of a standard DNS record: it associates a domain name to an IP address.
vps_configuration_reversedns_step1_desc2: Reverse DNS is particularly useful if your VPS is used as a private email server. Many mail servers are configured to reject emails from IP addresses that do not have Reverse DNS.
vps_configuration_reversedns_step1_desc3: By defining the Reverse DNS, your reduce the chances of your email being marked as spam.

vps_configuration_veeam_restore_step1_ch: Modify the root password on restoration
You cannot reset your VPS password until VMware Tools has been installed. However, you can reset it via rescue mode.
vps_configuration_veeam_restore_step1_wa: Important! Restoring your VPS will delete all of your current data.
The backup restore may take a few hours, depending on the size of the disk.
If you want to carry out a restoration, you have to dismount your current backup beforehand.

vps_tab_cloud_database_description:
Need reliable, high-performance databases that are fully-managed by OVHcloud?
Order our Cloud Databases service.
You will have a standalone database that is compatible with all of your OVHcloud products.
MariaDB, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL and Redis available
vps_tab_cloud_database_explanation:
All your databases are listed below.
For each database, you can authorise or delete your VPS IP,
and order new databases.
vps_tab_cloud_database_add_authorized_ip: Authorise the VPS to access this database
vps_tab_cloud_database_remove_authorized: Remove authorisation to access this database
vps_tab_cloud_database_fetch_error: An error has occurred loading databases.
vps_tab_cloud_database_whitelist_add_suc: The database has authorised the VPS. This means the VPS can now access the database.
vps_tab_cloud_database_whitelist_add_err: An error has occurred requesting authorisation for the VPS.
vps_tab_cloud_database_whitelist_remove_: The VPS has been removed from database access. It can no longer access the database.
An error has occurred requesting database access removal.
vps_tab_cloud_database_order_disclaimer: Web Cloud Databases require a service that has access to the public network/internet.
vps_tab_cloud_database_order_explanation:
Only accessible via the public network
Unlimited databases
512MB - 4GB guaranteed RAM
8GB - 54GB guaranteed disk space
Automatic daily backups
Up to 200 concurrent connections

vps_autorenew_stop_bother_error: An error has occurred sending the request to stop receiving alerts about automatic renewal.
vps_autorenew_alert: Simplify the way you manage your infrastructure, and use automatic renewal for your VPS. This will put an end to all the reminders, and any risk of accidental deletions.
vps_move_alert: Your VPS has changed universe. You will soon find all of your servers (virtual and dedicated) in one large product universe.
vps_configuration_sla_title_enable: Do you want to enable SLA monitoring for this server?
vps_configuration_sla_title_disable: Do you want to disable SLA monitoring for this server?
vps_service_expired: The {{vps}} service has not been renewed. This could be due to your own decision or a late payment on your part.
vps_new_range_available_introduction: Our VPS ranges are changing, and so is the OVHcloud Control Panel.
vps_new_range_available_call_to_upgrade_: To get the very latest updates, order a new model via the OVHcloud Control Panel, transfer your data, then cancel your old server.
To get the most out of our technology, upgrade your machine in just a few clicks.
vps_additional_disk_cant_upgrade: If you would like to upgrade your additional disk, you will need to migrate to the new VPS range first by clicking “Migrate my VPS” above.
vps_configuration_desactivate_option_dis: The additional disk may be cancelled once your VPS subscription has ended.
